dialogs.patient: I have been feeling Pharynx discomfort.
dialogs.doctor: Is it? Then do you experience Suppuration?
In that case, do you have any Cough?
Oh, do you have any First degree swelling of bilateral tonsils?

dialogs.patient: Yes Doctor, I am feeling that as well

dialogs.doctor: Based on these symptoms, it is possible that the patient has tonsillitis.
